description: Crisp vegetarian spring rolls (you get two) served with a tantalizing Thai sweet and sour sauce.
Thai steamed dumplings (four in all) stuffed with minced pork and shrimp, and topped with toasted garlic and cilantro.
Sliced chicken breast marinated in a mixture of Thai spices and served on bamboo skewers with peanut sauce.
Chicken cooked in coconut milk with lemongrass, galangal, lime juice, cilantro, onion and mushrooms.
Spicy chicken soup specially seasoned with lime juice, lemongrass, mushrooms, onions and cilantro.
Spicy shrimp soup specially seasoned with lime juice, lemongrass, peppers, mushrooms, onions and cilantro.
Choice of chicken, pork, or shrimp stir-fried with egg, rice noodles, bean sprouts, green onions and our world-famous tamarind sauce.
Choice of chicken, beef, or pork stir-fried broad noodes, garlic, egg, broccoli, carrots and a special sauce.
Choice of chicken, beef, or pork stir-fried broad noodes, fresh basil, garlic, bell peppers and onion.
Choice of chicken or pork stir-fried with Thai peppers, basil, egg, red and green bell peppers and onions.
Choice of chicken, beef, or pork stir-fried with egg, fresh garlic, carrots, onion and tomatoes.
Choice of chicken or pork stir-fried with egg, curry powder, cashew nuts, raisins, onions, tomatoes and pineapple.
Choice of chicken, beef, or pork stir-fried with egg, fresh garlic, carrots, onion and tomatoes.
Choice of chicken, beef, or pork sauteed in a spicy garlic sauce with stir-fried vegetables on the side.
Choice of chicken, beef, or pork sauteed in a roasted chili sauce with cashew nuts, onions, broccoli, bell peppers, carrots and mushrooms.
Choice of chicken, beef, or pork sauteed with fresh basil, chili, garlic, onion, bell peppers and a special sauce.
Choice of chicken, beef, or pork sauteed with fresh ginger, bell pepper, baby corn, celery, onions, mushrooms and sliced carrots.
Shrimp, scallops and squid sauteed with onion, bell peppers and fresh basil.
Shrimp, scallops and squid sauteed with apsparagus, carrot, eggplant, mushrooms and zucchini in a roasted chili sauce.
Golden-fried soft shell crab served with green curry sauce, asparagus, carrots, bell peppers, bamboo shoots, peas and fresh basil.
Large Shrimp stir-fried with potato, carrots, onions and pineapple in a Thai yellow curry sauce.
Choice of chicken, beef or pork sauteed in coconut milk with bell peppers, sweet basil, bamboo shoots and zucchini.
Choice of chicken, beef or pork sauteed in coconut milk with green peas, carrots, broccoli, sweet basil and bell peppers.
Choice of chicken, beef or pork sauteed in coconut milk with potatoes, cashew nuts, onions and pineapple.
Singha beer don't ask no questions; Singha beer don't tell no lies.
ThaiBev brews Beer Chang, a pale lager. Chang, the Thai word for elephant, an animal with cultural and historical significance in Thailand.
Launched in 1932, Tiger beer became Singapore's first locally brewed beer.
